name: ReloadeR (SiTheHandsomeGuy)
description: ReloadeR, is a in-development project. 2D, Pixel Art, Post Apocalyptic setting, this game is basically a combination of Enter The Gungeon and Borderlands. With a randomized gun system, this game has a total of over 30,000,000 different gun combinations! Currently just a main menu and test level, there will eventually be more features, levels, enemies, and GUNS!
